name: Google-Play-Music-Desktop-Player-UNOFFICIAL-
description: A beautiful cross platform Desktop Player for Google Play Music

packageJSON.name: google-play-music-desktop-player
packageJSON.description: An electron wrapper for Google Play Music

scripts.test-electron: npm run test-electron-main && npm run test-electron-renderer
scripts.test-electron-coverage: npm run test-electron-main-coverage && npm run test-electron-renderer-coverage
scripts.test-electron-main-coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=coverage npm run test-electron-main -- -R test/istanbul-reporter
scripts.test-electron-renderer-coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=coverage npm run test-electron-renderer -- -R test/istanbul-reporter
scripts._remap: remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage-final.json -o coverage -t html && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage-final.json -o coverage/lcov.info -t lcovonly
scripts._coverage_publish: rm -f coverage/*.json coverage/*.remap && cd coverage && zip -r ../coverage.zip * && cd .. && node sig/publish-coverage.js

releases.name: Version 4.1.1
releases.body:
This is a minor release of Google Play Music Desktop Player Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • NEW: Slightly fancier settings dialog
  • NEW: Windows Media Service Integration (Lock screen music controls)
  • NEW: GoTo modal now follows redirects when verifying the URL
  • FIX: Window title is set to the current song correctly on darwin
  • FIX: Darwin title bar no longer visible in full screen
  • FIX: The update modal now waits 24 hours before showing again
Thanks to all the people who have helped with these features and fixes.

releases.name: Version 4.0.5
releases.body:
This is a patch release of Google Play Music Desktop Player Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • FIX: Mini player controls are visible again
Thanks to all the people who have helped with these features and fixes.

releases.name: Version 4.0.4
releases.body:
This is a patch release of Google Play Music Desktop Player. Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • NEW: Reset custom CSS with the "escape" key in settings
  • NEW: Add an option to stop the display sleeping
  • FIX: White flashes on macOS have been fixed
  • FIX: Better theming with the new GPM UI
  • FIX: Update dialog now doesn't block the mini player
Thanks to all the people who have helped with these features and fixes.

releases.name: Version 4.0.3
releases.body:
This is a patch release of Google Play Music Desktop Player This is mostly the fix the new UI that Google released today Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • NEW: Added Romanian and Pirate translations
  • FIX: Stuttering UI (mouse issues) have been fixed
  • FIX: 14/11/2016 Google Play Music UI changes are now supported
Thanks to all the people who have helped with these features and fixes.

releases.name: Version 4.0.2
releases.body:
This is a patch release of Google Play Music Desktop Player Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • NEW: Option to invert the tray icon color on linux
  • NEW: Added Czech and French translations
  • NEW: Volume events get sent to the Playback and webSocket API
  • FIX: Chromecast track progress is now updated correctly
  • FIX: The app would hang for 2 minutes on some systems. Now it doesn't
  • FIX: Certain crashes when reloading
  • FIX: PlaybackAPI JSON file now backs off if it fails to write the file
  • FIX: Crash when generating a crash report :/
  • FIX: Go To URL now works with shared playlists
  • FIX: React performance boosts
Thanks to all the people who have helped with these features and fixes.

releases.name: Version 4.0.1
releases.body:
This is a major release of Google Play Music Desktop Player **NOTE:** This is a patch on top of `4.0.0` to fix the black screen issue users were having Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • NEW: The UI has been rewritten from the ground up
  • NEW: UI is more "material-like" with fancy ripples and highlights
  • NEW: Added an alarm feature to start playing your music when you want
  • NEW: Client side errors are now reported via Sentry
  • NEW: Added a Russian translation
  • FIX: Performance issues some users experienced have been fixed
  • FIX: Lyrics failed to fetch in some cases
  • FIX: Thumbs up now send "love" messages to last.fm
  • FIX: GPM buttons that would open new tabs now open in your browser
  • FIX: Some theming issues
Thanks to all the people who have helped with these features and fixes.
And thanks to all of you for continuing to support and use this player, since launch we have had over 800,000 artifact downloads. And we have over 70,000 weekly active users. It's absolutely crazy, so thank you to everyone.

releases.name: Version 4.0.0
releases.body:
This is a major release of Google Play Music Desktop Player Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • NEW: The UI has been rewritten from the ground up
  • NEW: UI is more "material-like" with fancy ripples and highlights
  • NEW: Added an alarm feature to start playing your music when you want
  • NEW: Client side errors are now reported via Sentry
  • NEW: Added a Russian translation
  • FIX: Performance issues some users experienced have been fixed
  • FIX: Lyrics failed to fetch in some cases
  • FIX: Thumbs up now send "love" messages to last.fm
  • FIX: GPM buttons that would open new tabs now open in your browser
  • FIX: Some theming issues
Thanks to all the people who have helped with these features and fixes.
And thanks to all of you for continuing to support and use this player, since launch we have had over 800,000 artifact downloads. And we have over 70,000 weekly active users. It's absolutely crazy, so thank you to everyone.

releases.name: Version 3.6.0
releases.body:
This is a feature release of Google Play Music Desktop Player Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • NEW: Allow custom CSS injection. Style the app however you want
  • NEW: The window title bar is now themed on macOS
  • NEW: The new PlaybackAPI now exposes a library endpoint
  • NEW: We now have an updated authenticode certificate for code signing on windows
  • FIX: Now playing highlight color has been fixed
  • FIX: GPM no longer reloads when reconnecting to the WiFi
Thanks to all the people who have helped with these features and fixes.

releases.name: Version 3.5.0
releases.body:
This is a feature release of Google Play Music Desktop Player Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • NEW: Companion Android Remote Control has been released in an Open Beta
  • NOTE: Your PlaybackAPI must be enabled for the remote control to work
  • NEW: Icon on linux looks a bit nicer now
  • FIX: The new playlists UI that Google released recently
Thanks to all the people who have helped with these features and fixes.

releases.name: Version 3.4.3
releases.body:
As of 8/11/2016 Google released an update to Google Play Music which broke one of our modules which caused the player to reload randomly and not play songs.

This patch release fixes that issue and prevents a similar one from happening again.  Thanks for all the reports guys that lead to a quick identification and resolution of the issue.

This also fixes a few small bugs from `3.4.0`

releases.name: Version 3.4.2
releases.body:
As of 8/11/2016 Google released an update to Google Play Music which broke one of our modules which caused the player to reload randomly and not play songs.

This patch release fixes that issue and prevents a similar one from happening again.  Thanks for all the reports guys that lead to a quick identification and resolution of the issue.

This also fixes a few small bugs from `3.4.0`

releases.name: Version 3.4.1
releases.body:
As of 8/11/2016 Google released an update to Google Play Music which broke one of our modules which caused the player to reload randomly and not play songs.

This patch release fixes that issue and prevents a similar one from happening again.  Thanks for all the reports guys that lead to a quick identification and resolution of the issue.

This also fixes a few small bugs from `3.4.0`

releases.name: Version 3.4.0
releases.body:
This is a feature release of Google Play Music Desktop Player Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • NEW: Lyrics are now visible in thin windows
  • NEW: Desktop Notifications are now native notifications on Windows 8
  • FIX: The update notification always shows the buttons now
  • FIX: I3 Window Manager now works with the Mini Player
  • FIX: Startup JavaScript errors are gone for good
  • FIX: If you have more than one Chromecast they all appear now
  • FIX: Installing on Windows no longer trips AV warnings
API Changes
  • BREAKING: Under the hood we have updated to gmusic.js v6
  • BREAKING: The WebSocketAPI now refers to "songs" as "tracks"
  • NEW: The WebSocketAPI now exposes a few more methods. Check the docs
Thanks to all the people who have helped with these features and fixes.

releases.name: Version 3.3.0
releases.body:
This is a feature release of Google Play Music Desktop Player Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • NEW: Chromecast Support!!!!!
  • NEW: The PlaybackAPI now has ZeroConf
  • NEW: Native translations for German and Polish
  • FIX: Javascript error has occured bug when starting up
  • FIX: Tray icon is now the GPM favicon
  • FIX: Ridiculous CPU usage in some circumstances
  • FIX: The lyrics screen is now a lot nicer
  • FIX: Correctly set App category on macOS
  • FIX: Command + Left/Right now navigates back and forward on macOS
Thanks to all the people who have helped with these features and fixes.

releases.name: Version 3.2.5
releases.body:
This is a patch release of Google Play Music Desktop Player

Please update as soon as possible.

releases.name: Version 3.2.4
releases.body:
This is a patch release of Google Play Music Desktop Player Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • NEW: We have a brand new icon, this icon is based of the new Google Play Music icon
  • FIX: Added another source of lyrics and improved lyrics response time
  • FIX: OS X shortcuts now work for zooming and finding
  • FIX: The WebSocket API now sends data on initial connect as you would expect
  • FIX: The build process for arch linux now works without multiarch packages installed
Thanks to all the people who have helped with these features and fixes. **Exactly 35 users will have to manually update to this release... My bad**

Thanks to all the people who have helped with these features and fixes. **Exactly 141 users will have to manually update to this release... My bad**

releases.body:
This is a patch release of Google Play Music Desktop Player Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • NEW: We have a brand new icon, this icon is based of the new Google Play Music icon
  • FIX: Added another source of lyrics and improved lyrics response time
  • FIX: OS X shortcuts now work for zooming and finding
  • FIX: The WebSocket API now sends data on initial connect as you would expect

releases.name: Version 3.2.1
releases.body:
This is a minor feature release of Google Play Music Desktop Player Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • Implemented a lyrics overlay, this is in BETA but appears to work for most songs!
  • Fix song notifications on Ubuntu 16.04
  • You can now search with the standard shortcut (Control + F)
  • Standard browser back and forward keys (Alt + Left / Right) now work
  • Mouse buttons 4 and 5 now work on Linux
  • You can three finger swipe on OS X to navigate forward and back
  • Generic theming fixes
  • Updated to use the new orange the Google Play Music uses
Thanks to all the people who have helped with these features and fixes. **This release fixes an app icon issue on OS X**

releases.name: Version 3.2.0
releases.body:
This is a minor feature release of Google Play Music Desktop Player Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • Implemented a lyrics overlay, this is in BETA but appears to work for most songs!
  • Fix song notifications on Ubuntu 16.04
  • You can now search with the standard shortcut (Control + F)
  • Standard browser back and forward keys (Alt + Left / Right) now work
  • Mouse buttons 4 and 5 now work on Linux
  • You can three finger swipe on OS X to navigate forward and back
  • Generic theming fixes
  • Updated to use the new orange the Google Play Music uses
Thanks to all the people who have helped with these features and fixes.

releases.name: Version 3.1.0
releases.body:
This is a minor feature release of Google Play Music Desktop Player Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • Implemented a "light" theming mode. Toggle between light and dark in Settings
  • You can now navigate to GPM Url's from the app menu
  • Fixed a couple of bugs with the back button. It should now work for everyone!
  • Massive fix for media keys not working on Windows
  • Couple of fixes for media keys not working on Ubuntu
  • Added high DPI tray icons for OS X retina displays
  • You can now zoom in and out with the standard +/- shortcuts
  • Linux users can now make use of our MPRIS intergration
Thanks to all the people who have helped with these features and fixes.

releases.name: Version 3.0.1
releases.body:
This is a bugfix release of Google Play Music Desktop Player Here is a quick run down of all things that have changed.
  • Fixes to do with theming and mini player due to the latest Google changes
  • Space bar now properly playPauses the music
  • The shop button now actually opens the shop!
  • Mouse buttons 4 and 5 now act correctly as browser back and browser forward
  • There is now a back button in the UI #easynavigation
  • OSX and Linux now use native window borders by default, this can be changed in settings
  • You can now add hotkeys for volume control!
  • OS X - You can now go proper full screen
  • Linux - Config files are stored in a better place
Thanks to all the people who have helped with these bugfixes.

releases.name: Version 3.0.0
releases.body:
Woohoo, Version 3.0.0 is finally here.  

This is a major upgrade and you'll notice a few key things have changed.  First of all we have moved from C# native windows apps to a cross platform framework called Electron.  This brings with it some performance boosts and the brand new Mac OSX version of this application.

It also has some cool new features like hands free Voice Controls and removing flash (it is entirely HTML5) while keeping the features you know and love from this app.

releases.name: Version 2.1.1
releases.body:
This update fixes the update loop bug, sorry guys

What New!!
- New updater, the app will now handle everything from checking to install.  You'll get a popup when the update is ready for you
- Windows 7 no longer has that stupid UI glitch (hooray)
- There is now a splash screen, so you don't have to watch the app initialize

Fixes!!
- Updated the theming library, so a whole bunch of fixes there
- Windows 7 Resizing issues when in mini player mode

releases.name: Version 2.1.0
releases.body:
What New!!
- New updater, the app will now handle everything from checking to install.  You'll get a popup when the update is ready for you
- Windows 7 no longer has that stupid UI glitch (hooray)
- There is now a splash screen, so you don't have to watch the app initialize

Fixes!!
- Updated the theming library, so a whole bunch of fixes there
- Windows 7 Resizing issues when in mini player mode

releases.name: Version 2.0.2
releases.body:
What New!!
- Brand new installer, this installer fixes a few problems people were having with dependencies.  It is also now signed with a Microsoft Certificate for added security.  
- Upgraded to the CEF45, this brings more stability and some bug-fixes for things like the scroll bars
- Major overhaul of the internal code, lots of performance tweaks and such

Fixes!!
- DPI issues on High Res displays are fixed in this release
- Fixed some small theming issues
- Fixed some crashes due to bad album art urls
- Removed the "Reset and Close" button because it was useful and broke things...

releases.name: Version 2.0.1
releases.body:
If your UI is too small when after you update use the shortcuts (Ctrl +) and (Ctrl -) to zoom in and out.

What New!!
- Brand new installer, this installer fixes a few problems people were having with dependencies.  It is also now signed with a Microsoft Certificate for added security.  
- Upgraded to the CEF45, this brings more stability and some bug-fixes for things like the scroll bars
- Major overhaul of the internal code, lots of performance tweaks and such

Fixes!!
- DPI issues on High Res displays are fixed in this release
- Fixed some small theming issues
- Fixed some crashes due to bad album art urls
- Removed the "Reset and Close" button because it was useful and broke things...

releases.name: Version 2.0.0
releases.body:
## !! WARNING !!

**This update WILL cause issues for anyone using DPI scaling on windows.  DO NOT UPGRADE if you have a high DPI screen (4K or something like that)**

What New!!
- Brand new installer, this installer fixes a few problems people were having with dependencies.  It is also now signed with a Microsoft Certificate for added security.  
- Upgraded to the CEF45, this brings more stability and some bug-fixes for things like the scroll bars
- Major overhaul of the internal code, lots of performance tweaks and such

Fixes!!
- Fixed some small theming issues
- Fixed some crashes due to bad album art urls
- Removed the "Reset and Close" button because it was useful and broke things...

releases.name: Version 1.9.2
releases.body:
What New!!
- Dark theme highlight color now themes the logo in the slide out menu
- There is now an option to make the mini player always on top
- There is now a gitter chat channel, check out the GitHub repository for the link.  Use it to ask for help or chat with other GPM users

Fixes!!
- Fixed all the bugs introduced by Google's GPM update on 11/12/2015
- Google Apps for Work accounts can now use Desktop Settings
- Mini Player hover bugs are gone
- Title of the player is now always the song name, regardless of your desktop notifications setting

releases.name: Version 1.9.1
releases.body:
Last.fm login bug has been fixed.  Anyone who was failed to authenticate into last.fm should try again

Thanks to @eligrey who pointed out the issue and even suggested the fix.

Have fun guys :)

releases.name: Version 1.9.0
releases.body:
**Thank you guys so much for supporting this application**

Whats New!!
- The big one - last.fm integration is here!!!!  Navigate to the "Desktop Settings" option to log in and start scrobbling
- There is now a 64bit stream available to download, head to the GitHub release section to grab it
- First run users will have theming and other cool things straight away, not after restart
- You can now zoom in and out to see your music how you want to with the shortcuts (Ctrl + and Ctrl -) (Ctrl 0 resets the zoom)

Fixes!!
- Dark theme fixes (Thanks @dst33nburgh)
- Customization and theming now works for people in languages that aren't English (Sorry folks)
- Mouse forward and back buttons work as navigation inside the player now

releases.name: Version 1.8.0
releases.body:
**IMPORTANT:
If this is the first time installing / running this application.  Please open it once, log in to Google Play Music.  Then close it and re open it.  This is so that the customisations can be applied (themes and UI improvements and such)**

Whats New!!
- Made a new dedicated settings window for desktop player specific settings
- You can now customize the highlight color of the dark theme
- There is an option to enable / disable song change notifications

Fixes!!
- General code cleanup and optimizations
- Closing and reopening no longer messes up the size
- Themed some missing elements

releases.name: Version 1.7.0
releases.body:
Whats New!!
- Keyboard shortcuts now work in the mini player (Space and arrow keys)
- Window now works with aero snap
- Window can now be resized from the top, top left and top right
- Brought back those navigation arrows to make navigating easier

Fixes!!
- Removed double switches in the settings page
- Fixed false positive in Avira virus scanner
- Fixed desktop notifications on strange desktop layouts
- Desktop notification won't steal focus from your active app anymore

Enjoy!!

releases.name: Version 1.6.0
releases.body:
Whats New!!
- Major fix to combat the latest GPM release by Google
- New window theme (Material Design Style)
- Mini player is now resizable
- Size and location of both mini player and normal player are saved and restored between sessions
- Fixed a few memory leaks
- Scroll to change volume in mini player
- Fixed a few crash scenarios
- Added a nicer looking update alert

releases.name: Version 1.5.0
releases.body:
Whats New!!
- Mini Player Mode
- Activate the mini player with the pop out button in the bottom right of the player
- Fixed some dark theme color issues
- Fixed some graphical bugs to do with embedded flash

releases.name: Version 1.4.1
releases.body:
Whats New!!
- Desktop Notifications - An unobtrusive toast style notification on song change
- Cleaned up the GPM UI
- Implemented Forward and Backward history navigation buttons
- Fixed some dark theme color issues
- Fixed crash on update

**IMPORTANT**
If the install of this version fails, open task manager and close all instances of `CefSharp.BrowserSubprocess`

releases.name: Version 1.3.4
releases.body:
Whats New!!
- Fixed upgrade issue (Sometimes can't upgrade due to CEF not cleaning up)

releases.name: Version 1.3.3
releases.body:
Whats New!!
- NPAPI plugin has been re enabled (sorry guys) 

**DOWNLOAD REMOVED DUE TO BAD UPLOAD**

releases.name: Version 1.3.2
releases.body:
Whats New!!
- Background color flicker on open has been fixed
- Theme issues on certain pages have been fixed

releases.name: Version 1.3.1
releases.body:
Whats New!!
- Update checker -> Updates published on github will now be notified in the main app
- bugfix -> Exception thrown on form close due to keyboard hooks not beind detached

releases.name: Version 1.3.0
releases.body:
Whats New!!
- Scrolling bug fix.  Scrolling now scrolls a normal amount (not 20 pages at a time)
- Updated Embedded Browser (Now at chromium 43.0)
- Enabled the smooth scrolling chromium experiment
- Enabled the overlay scroll bars chromium experiment

releases.name: Version 1.2.2
releases.body:
Whats New!!
- Dark Theme bug fixes (js injection failing)

releases.name: Version 1.2.1
releases.body:
Whats New!!
- Dark Theme bug fixes (missing dark bits)
- Fixed cache issue on windows vista

releases.name: Version 1.2.0
releases.body:
Whats New!!
- Theming, you can now enable / disable a "Dark Theme" option in the Google Play Music Settings
- Distraction free, things like the Google App Switcher and the Notification pane have been hdiden so you can never accidently navigate away from Play Music
- Upload Music has been disabled because the drap and drop caused crashes :(

releases.name: Version 1.1.1
releases.body: Fixed an issue which would cause the program to crash upon entering any text

releases.name: Version 1.1.0
releases.body:
Whats New!!
- Improved media control support (Now supports previous / next track and stopping)
- Persistent login support, you login once and it will remember next time you open
- Taskbar media control support

releases.name: Initial Release
releases.body: First release
